1.name: All About Eve
1.description: An ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

2.name: Sunset Blvd.
2.description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

3.name: Cinderella
3.description: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

4.name: Rashômon
4.description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

5.name: King Solomon's Mines
5.description: Adventurer Allan Quartermain leads an expedition into uncharted African territory in an attempt to locate an explorer who went missing during his search for the fabled diamond mines of King Solomon.

6.name: Rio Grande
6.description: A cavalry officer posted on the Rio Grande must deal with murderous raiding Apaches, his son who's a risk-taking recruit and his wife from whom he has been separated for many years.

7.name: Annie Get Your Gun
7.description: The story of the great sharpshooter Annie Oakley, who rose to fame while dealing with her love/professional rival, Frank Butler.

8.name: Harvey
8.description: Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.

9.name: The Asphalt Jungle
9.description: A major heist goes off as planned, until bad luck and double crosses cause everything to unravel.

10.name: Winchester '73
10.description: The journey of a prized rifle from one ill-fated owner to another parallels a cowboy's search for a murderous fugitive.

11.name: Dance Hall
11.description: Episodic tale of four factory girls and their various romances at the local dance hall.

12.name: Broken Arrow
12.description: Tom Jeffords tries to make peace between settlers and Apaches in Arizona territory.

13.name: Summer Stock
13.description: A small-town farmer, down on her luck, finds her homestead invaded by a theatrical troupe invited to stay by her ne'er-do-well sister.

14.name: In a Lonely Place
14.description: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. But she begins to have doubts.

15.name: Treasure Island
15.description: The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate captain Long John Silver.

16.name: Los olvidados
16.description: A group of juvenile delinquents live a violent and crime-filled life in the festering slums of Mexico City, and the morals of young Pedro are gradually corrupted and destroyed by the others.

17.name: The Gunfighter
17.description: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.

18.name: Kansas Raiders
18.description: Outraged by Redleg atrocities, the James and Younger Brothers along with Kit Dalton join Quantrill's Raiders and find themselves participating in even worse war crimes.

19.name: Cheaper by the Dozen
19.description: "Cheaper By the Dozen", based on the real-life story of the Gilbreth family, follows them from Providence, Rhode Island to Montclair, New Jersey, and details the amusing anecdotes found in ...                See full summary »

20.name: Father of the Bride
20.description: The father of a young woman deals with the emotional pain of her getting married, along with the financial and organizational trouble of arranging the wedding.

21.name: Sierra
21.description: Hiding in the mountains from the law, father and son break wild horses until a lost female lawyer joins them to help clear their name, but some would rather see them dead.

22.name: Stage Fright
22.description: A struggling actress tries to help a friend prove his innocence when he's accused of murdering the husband of a high society entertainer.

23.name: Night and the City
23.description: A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.

24.name: Frenchie
24.description: Frenchie Fontaine sells her successful business in New Orleans to come West. Her reason? Find the men who killed her father, Frank Dawson. But she only knows one of the two who did and she's determined to find out the other.

25.name: Gun Crazy
25.description: A well meaning crack shot husband is pressured by his beautiful marksman wife to go on an interstate robbery spree, where he finds out just how depraved and deadly she really is.

26.name: Two Flags West
26.description: Forced by circumstances,Confederate POWs and Union soldiers join forces against Indians but old animosities resurface during their fragile alliance.

27.name: The Men
27.description: A paralyzed war vet tries to adjust to the world without the use of his limbs.

28.name: Orphée
28.description: A poet in love with Death follows his unhappy wife into the underworld.

29.name: Quicksand
29.description: After taking 20 dollars from his employer to go on a date with plans to repay it the next day, an auto mechanic falls into increasingly disastrous circumstances for more and more money which rapidly spirals out of his control.

30.name: Destination Moon
30.description: After their latest rocket fails, Dr. Charles Cargraves and retired General Thayer have to start over again. This time, Gen. Thayer approaches Jim Barnes, the head of his own aviation ...                See full summary »

31.name: Where the Sidewalk Ends
31.description: Det. Sgt. Mark Dixon wants to be something his old man wasn't: a guy on the right side of the law. But Dixon's vicious nature will get the better of him.

32.name: No Way Out
32.description: A black doctor is assigned to treat two white racist suspects who are brothers, and when one dies, it causes tension that could start a race riot.

33.name: Les enfants terribles
33.description: The dangerously obsessive relationship between a psychologically manipulative brother and sister who isolate themselves and draw others into their mind games.

34.name: Born Yesterday
34.description: A tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette, with unexpected results.

35.name: For Heaven's Sake
35.description: An angel disguises himself as a crusty old rancher in order to visit Earth and help an unborn child find suitable parents.

36.name: Ambush
36.description: In 1878, Ward Kinsman, a prospector and Indian scout, has been persuaded by the US Cavalry to find Mary Carlyle, the daughter of a general, who has been taken by Apaches.

37.name: Cairo Road
37.description: The never-ending struggle of an Egyptian Narcotics Bureau unit. This time around,the murder of a rich Arab named Bashiri leads colonel Yussef Bey and his right-hand man Lieutenant Mourad to...                See full summary »

38.name: Tea for Two
38.description: A socialite with aspirations of a career in show business bets her wealthy uncle $25,000 that she can say "no" to everything for two days straight, hoping winning will help her fulfill her dreams.

39.name: Wagon Master
39.description: Two young drifters guide a Mormon wagon train to the San Juan Valley and encounter cutthroats, Indians, geography, and moral challenges on the journey.

40.name: Stromboli, terra di Dio
40.description: Karin, a young woman from the Baltic countries, marries fisherman Antonio to escape from a prison camp. But she cannot get used to the tough life in Antonio's volcano-threatened village, Stromboli.

41.name: The Flame and the Arrow
41.description: Dardo, a Robin Hood-like figure, and his loyal followers use a Roman ruin in Medieval Lombardy as their headquarters as they conduct an insurgency against their Hessian conquerors.

42.name: Woman on the Run
42.description: Frank Johnson flees police after becoming an eyewitness to murder. He is pursued around scenic San Francisco by his wife, a reporter, the police, and - the murderer.

43.name: Panic in the Streets
43.description: A doctor and a policeman in New Orleans have only 48 hours to locate a killer infected with pneumonic plague.

44.name: Woman in Hiding
44.description: After her father is killed in an accident, mill heiress Deborah Chandler marries the plant manager, Selden Clark, but his motives are suspicious.

45.name: Rocketship X-M
45.description: An astronaut crew on their way to the Moon are unexpectedly propelled by gravitational forces and end up on Mars instead.

46.name: Union Station
46.description: A sharp-eyed woman spots a man with a gun on a train and her alert to the railroad police helps them in their search for a ruthless gang who have kidnapped a blind heiress.

47.name: Outrage
47.description: A young woman who has just become engaged has her life completely shattered when she is raped while on her way home from work.

48.name: Kiss Tomorrow Goodbye
48.description: Starting with a violent prison break, clever, ruthless Ralph Cotter corrupts everyone around him.

49.name: Caged
49.description: A naive nineteen year old widow becomes coarsened and cynical when she is sent to a woman's prison and is exposed to hardened criminals and sadistic guards.

50.name: Tarzan and the Slave Girl
50.description: As Jane and the local tribeswomen are abducted one by one by the wild Lionians, Tarzan attempts to persuade their prince to accept a potent medicament for his ailing men, while the girls face certain death. Can Tarzan set them free?
